summary: Diff shows changes to backend/main.mo and new/expanded frontend query hooks and URL param utilities, plus updates to a frontend file summary and project_state.json. The BuildRequest (REQ-33) is about minimally fixing build/deploy failures without touching immutable frontend paths; the diff does not provide clear evidence that the specific build/deploy failure was identified and resolved, and it appears to introduce unrelated UI/product work.

missing_requirements.requirement: Investigate the current build/deployment failure, identify the root cause, and implement the minimal code/configuration changes required so the project builds and deploys successfully again (backend Motoko + frontend React/TS), deploys without traps, and core routes render without a blank screen.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows substantial code additions/changes but does not include any explicit build/deployment configuration changes or evidence (e.g., fixing a specific compilation/type error, canister install/upgrade trap, or routing blank-screen issue). From the provided truncated snippets, it is not possible to confirm that the build now compiles cleanly, deploys successfully, and that / and /seller-dashboard render correctly.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/expanded URL parameter + sessionStorage utilities (getUrlParameter/getPersistedUrlParameter/clearSessionParameter, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-33 requests minimal fixes to unblock build/deploy; URL parameter management is not mentioned as required and may be unrelated feature work.

hallucinated_features.description: Extensive new/updated React Query hooks covering many backend operations (supplier/product/category/cart/checkout, etc.), including additional behaviors like registering a supplier when saving a user profile.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-33 does not request new data-layer features; only minimal changes to restore build/deploy. The diff indicates broad functional surface area changes beyond a targeted fix.

hallucinated_features.description: UI/branding and multiple page/component changes described (routing logic, Header/Footer redesign, HomePage overhaul, new modals/screens, Stripe setup modal, multiple pages like Cart/Checkout/PaymentSuccess/Failure) and Tailwind/theme updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly outside scope per BuildRequest non-goals (no new product features/UI redesign/additional pages unrelated to unblocking build/deploy). While the actual code for these files is not shown as modified in the diff list, the modified frontend-file-summaries.txt asserts these changes as part of the work.
